about_the_game:
Welcome to Compliment Island, a heartwarming and healing idle cultivation collection game. In this beautiful island world, you will live alongside a group of unique Encouraging Spirits who bring you heartfelt encouragement and comfort every day. Whether it’s a sunny day or a moment when you feel a bit tired, Compliment Island will be your sanctuary for the soul.


Heartwarming and Healing: Find a moment of peace in your busy life. The Encouraging Spirits will deliver personalized compliments and encouragement to keep your mood bright.

Idle Cultivation, Relaxed Play: No complex operations are needed. Simply idle and watch as the island flourishes. Enjoy the serene environment you and the Encouraging Spirits create together.

Spirit Collection, Full of Surprises: Collect Encouraging Spirits with different personalities and styles. Each spirit has unique lines of encouragement and stories to explore, making collecting a joyful experience.

Daily Greetings, Emotional Connection: Log in every day to receive warm greetings from the Encouraging Spirits. They will soothe your soul and bring you uplifting energy.

Beautiful Art Style, Healing Experience: The game features a fresh and beautiful art style. Every frame feels like a peaceful landscape painting, allowing you to relax and heal through its visuals.
